title: Cinnamon-Maple Syrup
directions: 1. Heat the syrup and cinnamon sticks in a saucepan over low heat for 10 minutes.
2. Remove from the heat and let steep for 1 hour.
3. Remove the cinnamon sticks and pour the syrup into a small pitcher. This can be made up to 1 week in advance and refrigerated. Reheat before serving.
